PolygonVersionD Class Reference

Version D of the polygon filler. Similar to C, but uses mask tracking. More...

Detailed Description

Version D of the polygon filler. Similar to C, but uses mask tracking.

bool PolygonVersionD::init (  unsigned int  aWidth,
unsigned int  aHeight
) 
 

Initializer.

aWidth and aHeight define the maximum output size for the filler. The filler will output to larger bitmaps as well, but the output will be cropped.

bool PolygonVersionD::isSupported (  BitmapData::BitmapFormat  aFormat  )  [protected]
 

Checks if a surface format is supported.
